data:
Based on the provided information, here is the list of features that are out of the product's scope:

• Secrets Management
• Code Builder
• Autoscaling Groups
• CI/CD
• GPT
• Figma
• Scalability

These features are related to the architecture and development of the product, but they are not directly related to the core idea of the product, which is to provide an AI-powered education platform for Occupational Risk Prevention.
